oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Irma Merrill for all of Shelby County
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: campaigns; elections; Merrill, Irma; politics; Shelby County; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On front: a cartoon depicting Merrill holding hands with an elephant and a donkey while straddling the line between the two parties. On back: photocopied news pieces from the Commercial Appeal.
